Children’s Learn and Play Weekend Camp üìçNational Tsing Hua University Jan. 2021 Vice President Led a team of 50 college students in designing educational lessons and activities for the weekend camp.

item.title: Build Model and Develop GUI for Demand Forecast of Semiconductor Raw Materials
item.description: Advisor: Prof. Chien-Wei Wu Co-authors: Ying-Tung Yeh, Lucy Lin Abstract The advent of the 5G era has ushered in accelerated growth in AI, IoT, and autonomous vehicles. Taiwan, being a crucial entity in the global manufacturing supply chain, is witnessing a burgeoning semiconductor industry in response to these technological advancements. Nonetheless, this industry is substantially dependent on imported raw materials, a dependency that exposes it to potential disruptions due to external factors like trade conflicts or global crises such as the COVID-19 pandemic.

item.title: Szu-Tung (Katniss) Chen
item.description: Education University of Michigan (U of M) - Ann Arbor, MI 2022 - Present M.S. in Industrial and Operations Engineering (IOE) GPA: 4.0/4.0 National Tsing Hua University (NTHU) - Hsinchu, Taiwan 2018 - 2022 B.S. in Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM) GPA: 3.96/4.3 Ranking: top 10% Experiences Interaction and Collaboration Research Lab (ICRL) - U of M 2022 - Present Graduate Student Researcher Advisor: Prof. Xi Jessie Yang University of Michigan Transportation Research Institute 2023 - Present Graduate Student Researcher
